changelog:
No JSON update required.
- Mumbai:  Special Ass - Removes 2 targets who spawn in out of bounds Rangan Tower
- Berlin: The Drop - Removes box that blocks safe
- Passenger Train: NPCs should no longer be able to walk on air at back of train, textureless courier should now be fixed(?)
- Whittleton Creek: Night - Can no longer buggily take Mr Wilson's clothes
- Chongqing: Cloudy Day Lockdown - Removes last lockdown worker from target lists, adds ~6x existing NPCs as targets
